Bosses.Name: The Endsinger (Phase 1)
Bosses.Strategy:
Players must pay attention to the animations of the boss, as these indicate which areas of the arena are hit by mechanics. 
Also, players must pay attention to the summoned planets that move around the edge of the arena, as they result in massive AoEs when they crash into each other. Furthermore the boss frequently rewinds time to reconstruct planets and let them crash again.

Mechanics.Name: Elegeia
Mechanics.Description:
Raidwide, followed by two planets spawning around the arena.
These will start orbiting the platform until the faster one crashes into the slower one, resulting in a massive circle AoE.

Mechanics.Name: Galaxias
Mechanics.Description: Outward knockback from the middle of the platform.

Mechanics.Name: Elenchos
Mechanics.Description:
One of two possible variations of line AoEs.
Endsinger's mouth glows:
Line AoE through the middle of the arena.
Endsinger cries tears:
Two line AoEs at the edge of the platform.

Mechanics.Name: Death's Embrace
Mechanics.Description:
Targeted cone AoEs at random players, followed by adds at position where players were hit.
Adds detonate in circle AoEs after they finish casting Pharmakon.

Mechanics.Name: Aporrhos
Mechanics.Description: Spawns 4 miniature Endsinger heads that cast line AoEs in the direction they are facing.

Mechanics.Name: Hubris
Mechanics.Description: Heavy AoE Tankbuster on both tanks.

Mechanics.Name: Elegeia Unforgotten
Mechanics.Description: Elegeia followed by the planets partially reforming, as the boss partially turns back and freezes time.

Mechanics.Name: Fatalism
Mechanics.Description: Further rewinds time one planet collision to let them collide once more in another massive AoE.

Mechanics.Name: Ekstasis
Mechanics.Description: Circle AoEs that grow in size.

Mechanics.Name: Interstellar
Mechanics.Description:
Boss repositions and does a dive attack.
At the same time four players get marked with a targeted circle AoE.

Mechanics.Name: Nemesis
Mechanics.Description: Targeted circle AoE on every player.

Mechanics.Name: Planetes
Mechanics.Description: Transition into add phase, as Kakodaimon is summoned.

Bosses.Name: Kakodaimon
Bosses.Strategy:
This phase is a DPS check. Feel free to use melee Limit Break, as the Limit Gauge will fully charges when the add dies. 
The add must die before the Despair gauge reaches 100.

Mechanics.Name: Meteor Radiant
Mechanics.Description: Spawns planets on the edge of the platform that will crash in large circle AoEs onto the platform.

Mechanics.Name: Meteor Outburst
Mechanics.Description: Targeted circle AoE on every player.

Bosses.Name: The Endsinger (Phase 2)
Bosses.Strategy: This phase is just a cinematic finishing struggle sequence. Mechanics are a light healing check and a couple AoEs to avoid.

Mechanics.Name: Telomania
Mechanics.Description:
3 mechanics loop consisting of 4 cleaves, followed by a raidwide, followed by 3 sets of puddles spawning below players.
Repeats until the boss is dead.
